follow.confirmUnfollowMessage: You will no longer receive notifications from this channel and it will disappear from your followed list.

chat.heading: Chat
chat.unavailableMessage: Chat is unavailable while there is no stream on the channel. Please check back later!

confirmModal.heading: Stream Thumbnail Removal
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete the stream thumbnail? This action cannot be undone.

thumbnail.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, or GIF. Max size: 10 MB.

info.titleDescription: Enter the title of your stream. It should be short and memorable.
info.categoryDescription: Select the category your content belongs to. This will help viewers find your streams more easily.

success.heading: Payment Successful!
success.congratulations: You now have access to the channel's premium content!
success.support: If you have any questions, contact our support.

register.heading: Register on TeaStream
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
register.usernameDescription: This is the name other users will know you by. You can change it later.
register.emailDescription: We may use your email for sending account-related notifications.
register.passwordDescription: The password must contain at least 8 characters.
register.successAlertDescription: A verification email has been sent to your inbox. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder

login.heading: Login to TeaStream
login.backButtonLabel: Don't have an account? Sign up!
login.loginDescription: Your username or email that you used during registration.
login.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration.
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your authentication app.

resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.emailDescription: The email you used during registration
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a password reset link to your email. If you have enabled Telegram notifications, the link was sent there as well

newPassword.heading: New password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password for confirmation
newPassword.errorMessage: Error when setting a new password

deactivate.heading: Deactivate Account
deactivate.emailDescription: Your email that you used during registration
deactivate.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
deactivate.pinDescription: A code has been sent to your email. If you enabled Telegram notifications, we sent the code there as well
deactivate.successMessage: You have successfully deactivated your account

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your settings

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Customize your profile by changing your avatar, personal information, and social media links. Update your information so that other users can learn more about you.

avatar.heading: Profile Image

confirmModal.heading: Remove Avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to remove your profile image? This action cannot be undone.

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP or GIF. Max size: 10 MB.

info.heading: Profile Settings
info.usernameDescription: This is how other users will know you.
info.displayNameDescription: You can use uppercase letters in your display name as you wish.
info.bioDescription: The information about yourself should contain no more than 300 characters.

createForm.heading: Social Media Links
createForm.urlDescription: Where does this link lead? Please enter the full URL, e.g., https://github.com/TeaCoder52

socialLinks.successReorderMessage: Order of social media links changed
socialLinks.errorReorderMessage: Error changing order of social media links

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings, including access changes, security, and deactivation options.
header.securityDescription: Set up two-factor authentication and auto-renewals for enhanced protection of your data.
header.deactivationDescription: If you want to temporarily or permanently disable your account, use this option. Be aware of the consequences.

password.heading: Account Password
password.oldPasswordDescription: Enter your old password to verify your identity before changing your password. This is necessary to ensure the security of your account.
password.newPasswordDescription: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long. It is recommended to use special characters for added security.

twoFactor.heading: TOTP Authentication
twoFactor.description: Enhance your account security by enabling TOTP authentication. This additional layer of protection requires entering a unique code, making your account less vulnerable to unauthorized access.

enable.heading: Enabling TOTP
enable.qrInstructions: Scan the QR code to add TOTP
enable.pinDescription: Please enter the 6-digit code provided by your authentication app.

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable TOTP?
disable.message: Disabling TOTP authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to proceed?

deactivation.heading: Account Deactivation
deactivation.description: After deactivating your account, you will not be able to log in. Your account will be completely deleted after 7 days. Until then, you can contact support to restore access and unlock your account.

confirmModal.heading: Deactivation Confirmation
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? Access can only be restored within 7 days.

header.heading: Appearance
header.description: Customize the look of the website interface to your liking. Choose a theme and language that make your experience more comfortable.

theme.heading: Change Theme
theme.description: You can choose a dark or light theme for the website interface.
theme.successMessage: The website theme has been successfully changed

language.heading: Website Language
language.description: Select the language that will be used on the website.
language.successMessage: The website language has been successfully changed

color.heading: Accent Color
color.description: Choose an accent color for the interface

header.heading: Notifications
header.description: Configure how you want to receive notifications from TeaStream. You will receive notifications about the start of streams on the channels you are subscribed to, as well as about new followers.

siteNotifications.heading: Site Notifications
siteNotifications.description: If you turn off site notifications, you will not receive notifications about new subscribers to your channel and notifications about new streams.

telegramNotifications.heading: Telegram Notifications
telegramNotifications.description: If you enable notifications via Telegram, your TeaStream account will be linked to your Telegram account, and you will receive messages about new subscriptions, new streams, password resets, and two-factor authentication codes.

notifications.successMessage: Notification settings have been successfully updated

header.heading: Sessions
header.description: Sessions are devices that you are currently using or have used to access your TeaStream account. Here you can see the active sessions right now.

confirmModal.heading: Delete Session
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this session? This action will result in the irreversible deletion of the session on this device and will terminate all active actions associated with it.

header.heading: Stream Keys
header.description: Generate a URL and key for streaming.

instructionModal.heading: 🛠️ OBS Setup Guide for Live Streaming 🛠️
instructionModal.description: To start sharing your content with your audience, follow this step-by-step guide to connecting OBS Studio. Just a few steps, and you're ready to go live!
instructionModal.step1Title: 🔑 Step 1: Download OBS Studio and Generate Server URL and Stream Key
instructionModal.step1Description: To start streaming, you need two key elements: Server URL and Stream Key. Follow these steps:
instructionModal.downloadObsDescription: Before setting up your stream, download and install the program
instructionModal.copyKeys: Copy Server URL and Stream Key
instructionModal.copyKeysDescription: Once generated, you will see two fields: Server URL and Stream Key. Click the copy icons next to each field to save them to your clipboard.
instructionModal.step2Description: Now that you have the required data, let’s set up OBS to work with your stream:
instructionModal.openObsDescription: If OBS is not installed yet, download it from the official site and install it. Once launched, the main OBS page will open.
instructionModal.openStreamSettingsDescription: In the top menu, click “File” → “Settings.” Go to the “Stream” tab.
instructionModal.enterDetailsDescription: In the 'Service' field, select 'Custom...'. Paste the previously copied Server URL into the 'URL' field. In the 'Stream Key' field, enter your Stream Key.
instructionModal.saveSettingsDescription: Click 'Apply' and then 'OK' to save the changes.
instructionModal.step3Description: After successfully setting up OBS, you’re ready to start a live broadcast:
instructionModal.startStreamDescription: Return to the main OBS screen and click the 'Start Streaming' button.
instructionModal.monitorStreamDescription: Your stream will begin in real-time, and you can monitor it both on the platform and in OBS.
instructionModal.congrats: ✨ Congratulations! You've successfully set up OBS for streaming on our platform. Your audience awaits new exciting moments and content! 🎉

createModal.heading: Generate Keys
createModal.ingressTypeDescription: Select RTMP for classic broadcasting or WHIP for WebRTC connections.

header.heading: Chat Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your chat settings.

isChatEnabled.heading: Enable Chat
isChatEnabled.description: If you enable chat, viewers will be able to send messages in the chat during your broadcast.

isChatFollowersOnly.heading: Followers-Only Chat
isChatFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only your followers will be able to send messages in the chat.

isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.heading: Premium Followers-Only Chat
isChatPremiumFollowersOnly.description: If you enable this setting, only premium followers will be able to send messages in the chat.

header.heading: Followers
header.description: Here is a list of all your followers.

header.heading: Sponsors
header.description: Here is a list of all your sponsors.

header.heading: Premium Plans
header.description: Here is the list of premium plans for your channel.

alert.heading: Channel verification required
alert.description: To create premium plans, your channel must be verified. You only need 10 subscribers to get the checkmark and unlock access to this feature.

createForm.heading: Create Plan
createForm.titleDescription: Enter the name of your plan. This name will be displayed to your subscribers.
createForm.descriptionDescription: Describe what your plan includes. This will help your subscribers understand the benefits of the subscription.
createForm.priceDescription: Specify the price of your plan in currency. This is the amount users will pay for the subscription.

header.heading: Transactions
header.description: Here are the transactions related to channel sponsorship.

emptyState.heading: Nothing found
emptyState.text: We've searched every corner of our site, but unfortunately, nothing was found for your request. Maybe you could try something else?
